Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47rh/Champlain
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 47th, King Drive, 43rd, Cottage Grove, and 47th, due to, street blockage, near 47rh/Champlain.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 47th, King Drive, 43rd, Cottage Grove, and 47th, due to, street blockage, near 47rh/Champlain.

Allow extra travel time.
